00029 #include "../detail/_noise.hpp"
00030 #include "./func_common.hpp"

00032 namespace glm{
00033 namespace detail
00034 {
00035         template <typename T, precision P>
00036         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, P> grad4(T const & j, detail::tvec4<T, P> const & ip)
00037         {
00038                 detail::tvec3<T, P> pXYZ = floor(fract(detail::tvec3<T, P>(j) * detail::tvec3<T, P>(ip)) * T(7)) * ip[2] - T(1);
00039                 T pW = static_cast<T>(1.5) - dot(abs(pXYZ), detail::tvec3<T, P>(1));
00040                 detail::tvec4<T, P> s = detail::tvec4<T, P>(lessThan(detail::tvec4<T, P>(pXYZ, pW), detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0)));
00041                 pXYZ = pXYZ + (detail::tvec3<T, P>(s) * T(2) - T(1)) * s.w; 
00042                 return detail::tvec4<T, P>(pXYZ, pW);
00043         }
00044 }//namespace detail
00045 
00046         template <typename T>
00047         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T noise1(T const & x)
00048         {
00049                 return noise1(detail::tvec2<T, defaultp>(x, T(0)));
00050         }
00051 
00052         template <typename T>
00053         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, defaultp> noise2(T const & x)
00054         {
00055                 return detail::tvec2<T, defaultp>(
00056                         noise1(x + T(0.0)),
00057                         noise1(x + T(1.0)));
00058         }
00059 
00060         template <typename T>
00061         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec3<T, defaultp> noise3(T const & x)
00062         {
00063                 return detail::tvec3<T, defaultp>(
00064                         noise1(x - T(1.0)),
00065                         noise1(x + T(0.0)),
00066                         noise1(x + T(1.0)));
00067         }
00068 
00069         template <typename T>
00070         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, defaultp> noise4(T const & x)
00071         {
00072                 return detail::tvec4<T, defaultp>(
00073                         noise1(x - T(1.0)),
00074                         noise1(x + T(0.0)),
00075                         noise1(x + T(1.0)),
00076                         noise1(x + T(2.0)));
00077         }
00078         
00079         template <typename T, precision P>
00080         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T noise1(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v)
00081         {
00082                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const C = detail::tvec4<T, P>(
00083                         T( 0.211324865405187),          // (3.0 -  sqrt(3.0)) / 6.0
00084                         T( 0.366025403784439),          //  0.5 * (sqrt(3.0)  - 1.0)
00085                         T(-0.577350269189626),          // -1.0 + 2.0 * C.x
00086                         T( 0.024390243902439));         //  1.0 / 41.0
00087                 
00088                 // First corner
00089                 detail::tvec2<T, P> i  = floor(v + dot(v, detail::tvec2<T, P>(C[1])));
00090                 detail::tvec2<T, P> x0 = v -   i + dot(i, detail::tvec2<T, P>(C[0]));
00091                 
00092                 // Other corners
00093                 //i1.x = step( x0.y, x0.x ); // x0.x > x0.y ? 1.0 : 0.0
00094                 //i1.y = 1.0 - i1.x;
00095                 detail::tvec2<T, P> i1 = (x0.x > x0.y) ? detail::tvec2<T, P>(1, 0) : detail::tvec2<T, P>(0, 1);
00096 
00097                 // x0 = x0 - 0.0 + 0.0 * C.xx ;
00098                 // x1 = x0 - i1 + 1.0 * C.xx ;
00099                 // x2 = x0 - 1.0 + 2.0 * C.xx ;
00100                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x12 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(x0.x, x0.y, x0.x, x0.y) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(C.x, C.x, C.z, C.z);
00101                 x12 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12) - i1, x12.z, x12.w);
00102                 
00103                 // Permutations
00104                 i = mod(i, T(289)); // Avoid truncation effects in permutation
00105                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p = detail::permute(
00106                         detail::permute(i.y + detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(0), i1.y, T(1))) + i.x + detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(0), i1.x, T(1)));
00107                 
00108                 detail::tvec3<T, P> m = max(T(0.5) - detail::tvec3<T, P>(
00109                         dot(x0, x0),
00110                         dot(detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.x, x12.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.x, x12.y)),
00111                         dot(detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.z, x12.w), detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.z, x12.w))), T(0));
00112                 
00113                 m = m * m;
00114                 m = m * m;
00115                 
00116                 // Gradients: 41 points uniformly over a line, mapped onto a diamond.
00117                 // The ring size 17*17 = 289 is close to a multiple of 41 (41*7 = 287)
00118                 
00119                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x = static_cast<T>(2) * fract(p * C.w) - T(1);
00120                 detail::tvec3<T, P> h = abs(x) - T(0.5);
00121                 detail::tvec3<T, P> ox = floor(x + T(0.5));
00122                 detail::tvec3<T, P> a0 = x - ox;
00123                 
00124                 // Normalise gradients implicitly by scaling m
00125                 // Inlined for speed: m *= taylorInvSqrt( a0*a0 + h*h );
00126                 m *= static_cast<T>(1.79284291400159) - T(0.85373472095314) * (a0 * a0 + h * h);
00127                 
00128                 // Compute final noise value at P
00129                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g;
00130                 g.x  = a0.x  * x0.x  + h.x  * x0.y;
00131                 //g.yz = a0.yz * x12.xz + h.yz * x12.yw;
00132                 g.y = a0.y * x12.x + h.y * x12.y;
00133                 g.z = a0.z * x12.z + h.z * x12.w;
00134                 return T(130) * dot(m, g);
00135         }
00136         
00137         template <typename T, precision P>
00138         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T noise1(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v)
00139         {
00140                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const C(1.0 / 6.0, 1.0 / 3.0);
00141                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const D(0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0);
00142                 
00143                 // First corner
00144                 detail::tvec3<T, P> i(floor(v + dot(v, detail::tvec3<T, P>(C.y))));
00145                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x0(v - i + dot(i, detail::tvec3<T, P>(C.x)));
00146                 
00147                 // Other corners
00148                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g(step(detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.y, x0.z, x0.x), x0));
00149                 detail::tvec3<T, P> l(T(1) - g);
00150                 detail::tvec3<T, P> i1(min(g, detail::tvec3<T, P>(l.z, l.x, l.y)));
00151                 detail::tvec3<T, P> i2(max(g, detail::tvec3<T, P>(l.z, l.x, l.y)));
00152                 
00153                 // x0 = x0 - 0.0 + 0.0 * C.xxx;
00154                 // x1 = x0 - i1  + 1.0 * C.xxx;
00155                 // x2 = x0 - i2  + 2.0 * C.xxx;
00156                 // x3 = x0 - 1.0 + 3.0 * C.xxx;
00157                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x1(x0 - i1 + C.x);
00158                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x2(x0 - i2 + C.y);          // 2.0*C.x = 1/3 = C.y
00159                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x3(x0 - D.y);                       // -1.0+3.0*C.x = -0.5 = -D.y
00160                 
00161                 // Permutations
00162                 i = mod289(i); 
00163                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p(detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(
00164                         i.z + detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0), i1.z, i2.z, T(1))) +
00165                         i.y + detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0), i1.y, i2.y, T(1))) +
00166                         i.x + detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0), i1.x, i2.x, T(1))));
00167                 
00168                 // Gradients: 7x7 points over a square, mapped onto an octahedron.
00169                 // The ring size 17*17 = 289 is close to a multiple of 49 (49*6 = 294)
00170                 T n_ = static_cast<T>(0.142857142857); // 1.0/7.0
00171                 detail::tvec3<T, P> ns(n_ * detail::tvec3<T, P>(D.w, D.y, D.z) - detail::tvec3<T, P>(D.x, D.z, D.x));
00172                 
00173                 detail::tvec4<T, P> j(p - T(49) * floor(p * ns.z * ns.z));      // mod(p,7*7)
00174                 
00175                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x_(floor(j * ns.z));
00176                 detail::tvec4<T, P> y_(floor(j - T(7) * x_));                           // mod(j,N)
00177                 
00178                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x(x_ * ns.x + ns.y);
00179                 detail::tvec4<T, P> y(y_ * ns.x + ns.y);
00180                 detail::tvec4<T, P> h(T(1) - abs(x) - abs(y));
00181                 
00182                 detail::tvec4<T, P> b0(x.x, x.y, y.x, y.y);
00183                 detail::tvec4<T, P> b1(x.z, x.w, y.z, y.w);
00184                 
00185                 // vec4 s0 = vec4(lessThan(b0,0.0))*2.0 - 1.0;
00186                 // vec4 s1 = vec4(lessThan(b1,0.0))*2.0 - 1.0;
00187                 detail::tvec4<T, P> s0(floor(b0) * T(2) + T(1));
00188                 detail::tvec4<T, P> s1(floor(b1) * T(2) + T(1));
00189                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sh(-step(h, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0)));
00190                 
00191                 detail::tvec4<T, P> a0 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(b0.x, b0.z, b0.y, b0.w) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(s0.x, s0.z, s0.y, s0.w) * detail::tvec4<T, P>(sh.x, sh.x, sh.y, sh.y);
00192                 detail::tvec4<T, P> a1 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(b1.x, b1.z, b1.y, b1.w) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(s1.x, s1.z, s1.y, s1.w) * detail::tvec4<T, P>(sh.z, sh.z, sh.w, sh.w);
00193                 
00194                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p0(a0.x, a0.y, h.x);
00195                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p1(a0.z, a0.w, h.y);
00196                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p2(a1.x, a1.y, h.z);
00197                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p3(a1.z, a1.w, h.w);
00198                 
00199                 // Normalise gradients
00200                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm = taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(p0, p0), dot(p1, p1), dot(p2, p2), dot(p3, p3)));
00201                 p0 *= norm.x;
00202                 p1 *= norm.y;
00203                 p2 *= norm.z;
00204                 p3 *= norm.w;
00205                 
00206                 // Mix final noise value
00207                 detail::tvec4<T, P> m = max(T(0.6) - detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(x0, x0), dot(x1, x1), dot(x2, x2), dot(x3, x3)), T(0));
00208                 m = m * m;
00209                 return T(42) * dot(m * m, detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(p0, x0), dot(p1, x1), dot(p2, x2), dot(p3, x3)));
00210         }
00211         
00212         template <typename T, precision P>
00213         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T noise1(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v)
00214         {
00215                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const C(
00216                         0.138196601125011,              // (5 - sqrt(5))/20  G4
00217                         0.276393202250021,              // 2 * G4
00218                         0.414589803375032,              // 3 * G4
00219                         -0.447213595499958);    // -1 + 4 * G4
00220                 
00221                 // (sqrt(5) - 1)/4 = F4, used once below
00222                 T const F4 = static_cast<T>(0.309016994374947451);
00223                 
00224                 // First corner
00225                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i  = floor(v + dot(v, detail::tvec4<T, P>(F4)));
00226                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x0 = v -   i + dot(i, detail::tvec4<T, P>(C.x));
00227                 
00228                 // Other corners
00229                 
00230                 // Rank sorting originally contributed by Bill Licea-Kane, AMD (formerly ATI)
00231                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i0;
00232                 detail::tvec3<T, P> isX = step(detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.y, x0.z, x0.w), detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.x));
00233                 detail::tvec3<T, P> isYZ = step(detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.z, x0.w, x0.w), detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.y, x0.y, x0.z));
00234                 
00235                 //  i0.x = dot(isX, vec3(1.0));
00236                 //i0.x = isX.x + isX.y + isX.z;
00237                 //i0.yzw = static_cast<T>(1) - isX;
00238                 i0 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(isX.x + isX.y + isX.z, T(1) - isX);
00239                 
00240                 //  i0.y += dot(isYZ.xy, vec2(1.0));
00241                 i0.y += isYZ.x + isYZ.y;
00242                 
00243                 //i0.zw += 1.0 - detail::tvec2<T, P>(isYZ.x, isYZ.y);
00244                 i0.z += static_cast<T>(1) - isYZ.x;
00245                 i0.w += static_cast<T>(1) - isYZ.y;
00246                 i0.z += isYZ.z;
00247                 i0.w += static_cast<T>(1) - isYZ.z;
00248                 
00249                 // i0 now contains the unique values 0,1,2,3 in each channel
00250                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i3 = clamp(i0, T(0), T(1));
00251                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i2 = clamp(i0 - T(1), T(0), T(1));
00252                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i1 = clamp(i0 - T(2), T(0), T(1));
00253                 
00254                 //  x0 = x0 - 0.0 + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00255                 //  x1 = x0 - i1  + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00256                 //  x2 = x0 - i2  + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00257                 //  x3 = x0 - i3  + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00258                 //  x4 = x0 - 1.0 + 4.0 * C.xxxx
00259                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x1 = x0 - i1 + C.x;
00260                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x2 = x0 - i2 + C.y;
00261                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x3 = x0 - i3 + C.z;
00262                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x4 = x0 + C.w;
00263                 
00264                 // Permutations
00265                 i = mod(i, T(289));
00266                 T j0 = detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(i.w) + i.z) + i.y) + i.x);
00267                 detail::tvec4<T, P> j1 = detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(
00268                         i.w + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.w, i2.w, i3.w, T(1))) +
00269                         i.z + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.z, i2.z, i3.z, T(1))) +
00270                         i.y + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.y, i2.y, i3.y, T(1))) +
00271                         i.x + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.x, i2.x, i3.x, T(1)));
00272                 
00273                 // Gradients: 7x7x6 points over a cube, mapped onto a 4-cross polytope
00274                 // 7*7*6 = 294, which is close to the ring size 17*17 = 289.
00275                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ip = detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(1) / T(294), T(1) / T(49), T(1) / T(7), T(0));
00276                 
00277                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p0 = detail::grad4(j0,   ip);
00278                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p1 = detail::grad4(j1.x, ip);
00279                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p2 = detail::grad4(j1.y, ip);
00280                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p3 = detail::grad4(j1.z, ip);
00281                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p4 = detail::grad4(j1.w, ip);
00282                 
00283                 // Normalise gradients
00284                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(p0, p0), dot(p1, p1), dot(p2, p2), dot(p3, p3)));
00285                 p0 *= norm.x;
00286                 p1 *= norm.y;
00287                 p2 *= norm.z;
00288                 p3 *= norm.w;
00289                 p4 *= taylorInvSqrt(dot(p4, p4));
00290                 
00291                 // Mix contributions from the five corners
00292                 detail::tvec3<T, P> m0 = max(T(0.6) - detail::tvec3<T, P>(dot(x0, x0), dot(x1, x1), dot(x2, x2)), T(0));
00293                 detail::tvec2<T, P> m1 = max(T(0.6) - detail::tvec2<T, P>(dot(x3, x3), dot(x4, x4)             ), T(0));
00294                 m0 = m0 * m0;
00295                 m1 = m1 * m1;
00296                 
00297                 return T(49) * (
00298                         dot(m0 * m0, detail::tvec3<T, P>(dot(p0, x0), dot(p1, x1), dot(p2, x2))) +
00299                         dot(m1 * m1, detail::tvec2<T, P>(dot(p3, x3), dot(p4, x4))));
00300         }
00301         
00302         template <typename T, precision P>
00303         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> noise2(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & x)
00304         {
00305                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00306                         noise1(x + detail::tvec2<T, P>(0.0)),
00307                         noise1(detail::tvec2<T, P>(0.0) - x));
00308         }

00311         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> noise2(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & x)

00314                         noise1(x + detail::tvec3<T, P>(0.0)),
00315                         noise1(detail::tvec3<T, P>(0.0) - x));

00319         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec2<T, P> noise2(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & x)
00320         {
00321                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(
00322                         noise1(x + detail::tvec4<T, P>(0)),
00323                         noise1(detail::tvec4<T, P>(0) - x));

00366         {

00376         {

00378                         noise1(x - detail::tvec4<T, P>(1)),
00379                         noise1(x + detail::tvec4<T, P>(0)),
